name: collection
title: Collection
description: Save files and add them to a collaction that you can browse later straight from Raycast.
author: david_karlsson

preferences.name: API_KEY
preferences.description: API key for authentication with the backend
preferences.title: API Key

commands.name: savePhoto
commands.title: Save Image to Collection
commands.subtitle: Save an image from URL
commands.description: Save an image from a URL to your collection

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
